trans-unit.source: $ conda install -c conda-forge ht
$ git clone git://github.com/CalebBell/ht.git
$ pip install ht
Alternatively, if you are using conda as your package management, you can simply install ht in your environment from conda-forge channel with:

trans-unit.source: Although not required by the ht license, if it is convenient for you, please cite ht if used in your work. Please also consider contributing any changes you make back, such that they may be incorporated into the main library and all of us will benefit from them.
trans-unit.target: Aunque no es requerido por la licencia ht,si es conveniente para usted,por favor cite ht si se usa en su trabajo.Por favor,también considere contribuir con cualquier cambio que haga,de manera que pueda ser incorporado a la biblioteca principal y todos nosotros nos beneficiemos de él.

trans-unit.source: Heat transfer component of Chemical Engineering Design Library (ChEDL)

trans-unit.source: Installation
LICENSE.txt
Latest source code
License information

The ht library depends on the SciPy library to provide numerical constants, interpolation, integration, and numerical solving functionality. ht runs on all operating systems which support Python, is quick to install, and is free of charge. ht is designed to be easy to use while still providing powerful functionality. If you need to perform some heat transfer calculations, give ht a try.
trans-unit.target: La biblioteca ht depende de la biblioteca de SciPy para proporcionar constantes numéricas,interpolación,integración y funcionalidad de resolución numérica.ht funciona en todos los sistemas operativos que soportan Python,es rápido de instalar y es gratuito.ht está diseñado para ser fácil de usar y al mismo tiempo proporcionar una potente funcionalidad.Si necesita realizar algunos cálculos de transferencia de calor,pruebe ht.

trans-unit.source: The latest development version of ht’s sources can be obtained at

trans-unit.source: What is ht?
for information on the terms & conditions for usage of this software, and a DISCLAIMER OF ALL WARRANTIES.

trans-unit.source: ht is MIT licensed. See
ht is open-source software for engineers and technicians working in the fields of chemical or mechanical engineering. It includes modules for various heat transfer functions.
trans-unit.target: ht es un software de código abierto para ingenieros y técnicos que trabajan en los campos de la ingeniería química o mecánica.Incluye módulos para varias funciones de transferencia de calor.
